description:
The Hedgehog: The Movie: The Game

by Steven Frank (https://stevenf.com/)

(My submission for The Hedgehog: The Movie: The Game Jam)

Oh no! The world is under attack by Jim Carrey's character and only a vague approximation of Sonic the Hedgehog can stop him.

Use the arrow keys to move left and right, and press left ctrl to shoot rings (in the Sonic tradition).  In the extremely unlikely event that Jim Carrey's character touches Sonic, it's Game Over!  Radical!

→ Play in browser or download below

(You can also download the project source code and tell me why left-firing rings are sometimes invisible, etc.)
